title: Ritz'n
typeOfFood: Vegan, International, Macrobiotic, Organic, Beer/Wine, Take-out
description: Natural foods and products shop with an attached vegetarian restaurant. Has an English menu: brown rice, miso soup, vegeburger, locally grown vegetable, seaweed, and no-sugar desserts. No smoking. Directions: Take Tsukuba express line from Akihabara to Tsukuba. At Tsukuba station, go out from A4 exit, take the bus No 30 or 31 towards to Hitachino-ushiku, get off the bus at Dohokoen-mae. Tshukuba express takes 45 min. and the bus takes 15 minutes. Address in Japanese: 茨城県つくば市上原747-84.
